title: Noisy layer
body_html: Implementation of Noisy Networks per #2024. The gist link from that issue is now obsolete; the forward pass no longer resamples the noise tensors each time, and I've added a method reset_noise to resample the noise tensors. Also, I used self.training to differentiate between train and eval passes. I ran some basic tests to make sure methods were functioning, but I still need to do more testing. Also, I'm not sure how to edit the docs. If someone can point me in the right direction for expectations on writing docs, I'd appreciate it.

body: Implementation of Noisy Networks per #2024.  The gist link from that issue is now obsolete; the forward pass no longer resamples the noise tensors each time, and I've added a method `reset_noise` to resample the noise tensors.  Also, I used `self.training` to differentiate between train and eval passes.  I ran some basic tests to make sure methods were functioning, but I still need to do more testing.  Also, I'm not sure how to edit the docs. If someone can point me in the right direction for expectations on writing docs, I'd appreciate it.
